overview: It’s the most wonderful time of the year – isn’t that what the late, great Andy Williams said about Christmas? Well whatever we think of the festive season, one thing’s for sure – it’s the perfect opportunity for hot, horny twinks such as Brad Fitt and Justin Conway to get together and keep warm as only they know how! So forget Santa coming down the chimney. Instead, savour the splendour of the Czech Republic’s finest celebrating Yuletide in style by cumming all over each other! Believe us, Christmas in Prague has never looked so fuckin’ hot!
title: Happy Holidays!
